thread.title: Arulnithi plays a deaf and dumb character in Radhamohan's Brindhavanam
thread.title_full: Arulnithi plays a deaf and dumb character in Radhamohan's Brindhavanam

author: Arvind Sundaram
title: Arulnithi plays a deaf and dumb character in Radhamohan's Brindhavanam
text:
Home > Tamil Movies > Tamil News Stories By Arvind Sundaram | Feb 20, 2017 
Arulnithi is awaiting the release of his film Brindhavanam, directed by Radhamohan and produced by Vansan Movies, which also stars Vivek and Tanya Ravichandran. 
The Demonte Colony actor posted an interesting information about the film through his official Twitter handle. His tweet read, " #brindhavanam ..playing a deaf and dumb role..Vivek sir is the main character..film by radha Mohan sir.produced by Vansan movies. ” 
It should be noted that Radhamohan’s Mozhi too, had Jyothika playing the role of a deaf and dumb character, which earned wide acclaim for her performance. Let us wait and see if Arulnithi will repeat the magic in Brindhavanam. 
*tweet is not spell-checked
